casebody.data:
Robert TAYLOR and Serina A. Taylor
v.
L.R. GORE, Nelson Soles, Soles and Walker, P.A., Bay Circle Realty, and Wilma Murphy. No. 657P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2004. William E. Wood, Whiteville, for L.R. Gore. Danforth Morton, Wilmington, for Bay Circle Realty and Murphy. James E. Hill, Jr., Whiteville, for Nelson Soles, Soles and Walker. Mark Nappier, Myrtle Beach, SC, for Taylors.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 31st day of December 2003 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of May 2004."
